header.name: chaos/preprocessor/control/inline_when.h
header.author: Paul Mensonides
header.overview: The header defines a macro that expands to an expression if a condition is 1.

macro.abstract: The macro expands to its second argument if its first argument is 1.

usage.param: The condition that determines whether the macro should expand to __VA_ARGS__ or nothing. Valid values are 0 and 1.
The resulting expression if bit is 1.
The condition that determines whether the macro should expand to x or nothing. Valid values are 0 and 1.
The resulting expression if bit is 1.

macro.para: If bit expands to 0, this macro expands to nothing. Otherwise, it expands to x or __VA_ARGS__.
This macro does not perform a Boolean conversion on bit. If this conversion is desirable, may be used instead.
This macro is lazy. If bit is 0, x (or __VA_ARGS__) is not evaluated.
